entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
